images.copyright: Equinox at the Temple of Kukulcan in Chichen Itza, Mexico (© Somatuscani/Getty Images Plus)
images.title: Spot the snake
images.caption: Stepping into autumn
images.desc: Look closely and you'll see a snake slithering down the steps of the Temple of Kukulcan (otherwise known as El Castillo or The Castle), in Chichen Itza, Mexico. Not a real snake of course, it's an image created by natural light and shadows which appears only during the spring and autumn equinoxes.
